allow: Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); print(f''''{len(data[""results""][""bindings""])} feeds''''); [print(f''''  - {b[""title""][""value""]}'''') for b in data[''''results''''][''''bindings'''']]")
